creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: mountain landscape with waterfall at bottom center; small structure with figure standing in front of red flame; in background, two figures, one in red and one in white, climb tall, narrow mountains; two small huts at lower mountains; inscription at ULQ
inscription: 聳初峯々天半擎履巌蹂樹;不些平山靈休恎愤黄跟險我本世間経此門 (Soaring peaks lift up the sky / Stepping on crags, trampling trees, with no level footholds, / Even mountain spirits fear to join me in this mountain steepness - / I pass this gate into the primeval world!) [transl. by Steven Addiss]
markings: center L edge, jar-shaped relief：？; center L edge, oval relief: 林谷
title: Togakushi Mountain Range
